scripts.build: npm run build-browser && npm run build-server
scripts.build-browser: NODE_ENV=production browserify browser -v -d --extension .js --extension jsx -t babelify -t envify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 > public/app.js
scripts.build-server: NODE_ENV=production browserify server -v -d --bare --extension js --extension jsx -t babelify -o server/index.built.js
scripts.start: concurrently -p name --names 'browser watchify,server watchify,server reload' -k 'npm run start-browser-build' 'npm run start-server-build' 'npm run start-server-reload'
scripts.start-browser-build: watchify browser -v -d --extension .js --extension jsx -t babelify -t envify -p livereactload -o public/app.js
scripts.start-server-build: watchify server -v -d --bare --extension js --extension jsx -t babelify -o server/index.built.js
